thread.title: Turkish Airlines changes winter 2015 Dubai operational aircraft
thread.title_full: Turkish Airlines changes winter 2015 Dubai operational aircraft

author: Assignment Editor
title: Turkish Airlines changes winter 2015 Dubai operational aircraft
text:
Turkish Airlines changes winter 2015 Dubai operational aircraft   
Sep 23, 2015 eTN   
Turkish Airlines will change the planned route for operational aircraft Istanbul Ataturk – Dubai, during winter 2015/16. From October 25, 2015 to March 26, 2016 (DXB departure until March 27, 2016), 1 of 2 daily TK760/761 service will be served by Airbus A340-300, instead of A330. 
Planned schedule as follow: TK762 IST0040 – 0710DXB 330 D TK760 IST1935 – 0200+1DXB 343 D TK761 DXB0315 – 0630IST 343 D TK763 DXB0825 – 1140IST 330 D 
With this service adjustment, Dubai would be one of the last destination served by Turkish Airlines’ A340 aircraft.
